body:
On 29 December 2015 at 20:57, Thomas de Zeeuw <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Just ran with golang.org/x/tools at
> a09dffbb6c9a92df8f0380ce64dc56316d3af9a1 and go at
> 8d5ff2e182c52c4fa6af18e536dcef6e12ad8cb2 and got the same error.
>
> panic: imported["github.com/golang/tools/godoc/dl"].err = open /Users/thomas/go/src/github.com/golang/tools/godoc/dl: too many open files
>
>
Are you certain you're using a binary built from the most recent version of
golang.org/x/tools/go/loader/loader.go?  The hash a09dffb looks right, but
the stack trace tells me that the version of this file is 739a26a from back
in August.  The assertion on line 533 moved around on every subsequent
revision, and was deleted entirely last week.

cheers
alan
